title: STUDY PLAN
content: The Applied Bachelor's in Automotive Engineering Technology program is designed to produce graduates who excel in the fields of automotive engineering and technology. This program combines automotive engineering theory with practical experience in laboratories and industry, covering vehicle design, testing, and development. Students will learn about environmentally friendly vehicle technologies, automation innovations, vehicle maintenance management, and the use of advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and IoT in the automotive field. This program prepares graduates to face the challenges of the rapidly evolving modern automotive industry in the era of technology.
